website_summaries.verdict: A sleek and stylish matte finish stand. We love that this comes with a remote and dimmer memory options to control your lighting requirements.
pros: Convenient touch control remote, tilting head for different light angles
This comes fitted with a two-part trip-free cable, which is especially useful if your outlet is oddly placed and you need to expose the cord
cons: Some users that have two or more of these lamps find that they can all be controlled by one remote, which is not ideal if you want independent varying brightness

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED // Remote started to fail after 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE #2: The replacement remote now also hardly responds anymore, just like the first one. Changing batteries does nothing. The bottom line is that the lamp is okay I suppose, but the remote is absolute trash. UPDATE #1: Customer Service contacted me and four days later I received a replacement remote. The new remote works just as expected so far! Will update this review again in case anything changes but I'm very happy with the customer service and the new remote so far. Original Review: Bought this lamp three weeks ago. About two weeks after use, the remote started to fail and barely responds anymore at this point. Pretty disappointed by how fast this product falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: RainerR

customer_reviews.title: Remote control works both lights I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I was so please with the first lamp that I purchased another one. To my surprise both remote controls control both lights. This might seem fantastic; however, one light is in the living room and on light is in a bedroom. Every time I use the remote to turn on the light both come on. When I use a remote to turn off a light both go off. This has rendered the remote controls useless. I do not recommend purchasing 2 lamps unless you want them to both be off or on at the same time. Excellent purchase if you only want one.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Renger

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!  Annoying control design.
customer_reviews.text: It's quick to unpack + assemble and lights up the room. Overall a great lamp with an annoying design flaw. The controls directly on the lamp are not user-friendly. It has be turned all the way up first in order to dim it (and vice versa) and can take a few tries to get a response. It's definitely not due to fat-fingering; I'm a pianist with pretty slim fingers. Fortunately, the remote has actual buttons has individual buttons for on, off, brighten and dim, and the remote itself even has a magnet to attach to a fridge/whiteboard.
customer_reviews.author: Sunbear

customer_reviews.title: Causes electrical interference!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well the lamp is more or less fine.. But it causes electronic interference. Tried everything I can think of to get rid of it like adding ferrite magnets core around the power cable for the lamp. But that didn't fix the problem. Have moved the lamp to other outlets in the room. But the only way to fix the interference is move the lamp to a different circuit which would remove it from the room that I actually need the lamp. I think the reason is the A/C adapter has no ground plug.. but not entirely sure. All i know is I purchased a different lamp and it doesn't cause this issue!
customer_reviews.author: P. Weatherby

customer_reviews.title: Pole switch near top.
customer_reviews.text: Compared the Kira, Tenergy, Trond, Teckin and Jolly Joy. This was a keeper. Cons for me was the the pole switch was near the top near the light. Wanted two to sit behind my side and my wife's side of our reclining sofa. Switch too high to turn around and reach from seated position. Remotes no good as one remote controls both lamps simultaneously. My wife and I like our lamps at different levels. Kept for room where these issues don't matter.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and practical floor lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my floor lamp yesterday, and from the moment we started using it in living room, we are definitely impressed with it’s convenient style, brightness, and ease of use. It absolutely brightens up our living room in one click...Good thing it comes with a remote control!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela SJTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Worked only once
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was great while it worked for the first twenty minutes. The style was good, the lamp was bright as expected, and the availability of a remote is a plus. The problem is, the switch on the lamp is not sensitive and I had to keep trying to touch all over the switch to find the magic point. Could not find it. I then used the remote and it worked. Well, it worked once. Once I turned off the lamp, it never worked again. Not by the touch switch, and not by the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Fairfax User

customer_reviews.title: Not that Bright
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is not that bright, I expected more. It is not a 150 W equivalent. Plus the power pack gets really hot at high output. Assembly is easy, but the they put tape on the styrofoam and to open the box you have tear the tape generating a ton of little pieces of styrofoam which are a pain to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: JC Reader

customer_reviews.title: Brightness diminishes quickly
customer_reviews.text: I've had the lamp for 10 months, I purchased it 12/19 unboxed for first use on 2/20, it started out so bright; my livingroom illuminated in light and as time passed so did that illumination of brightness (sad part is I don't use the lamp daily, as an essential worker my time home was limited), in addition to the lack of brightness it tends to turn itself on; on 4 occasions I have come home or woken up to the lamp being on (seems there's a malfunction within the wiring) so now I keep it unplugged until I need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brigetjones

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED DECEMBER 2, 2019
customer_reviews.text: Nice color of light. Great swivel to direct light. Lamp fits in most any decor. I bought this lamp for living room. I plugged it in wall electrical socket connecting to wall light switch. I ordered another one for a bedroom and received it today. Wonderful!! I plan to buy one more for another bedroom. I ORDERED THE 3rd ONE FOR ANOTHER BEDROOM. Received it today DECEMBER 2, 2019. Outer box was open. Inner product box was partially open with parts sticking out the top of box. The product was rattling inside box. I did not take out of inner box so I don’t know what all was broken or damaged. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop

customer_reviews.title: Lamp may have a short in the wires
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if my light has a short in the wire, but sometimes when I’m asleep, the light will come in again. Yes, it just comes on in the middle of the night, and wakes me up. I still like the lamp, it’s great to not have to get up and turn it off, but for it to turn on, without me using the control, can be annoying. I also tried to contact the manufacturer, sent an email, and I haven’t heard back from them.
customer_reviews.author: pittmanlm

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic light - but only buy one!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME light. I especially love the remote control and being able to control it from the comfort of my chair. In fact it was so awesome, I bought a second one for another room. I guess sometimes too much of a good thing isn't a good thing! The remotes are so powerful / the light so sensitive, either remote can control the light in the opposite room even though the lights are about 60 feet away and on opposite sides of the house. It's really harmed the functionality for either light. I wish there was a way to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: stopped working one year after purchase :/
customer_reviews.text: This was a good lamp for the first year, but for $80 I would have expected a lamp that lasted more than one year however.. I woke up one morning, and suddenly the lamp stopped responding to the remote control! Which renders the lamp COMPLETELY USELESS for my purposes, as the remote control was one of the key reasons why I purchased the lamp in the first place. Now I have to junk it and buy a new lamp... needless to say I will NOT be purchasing the same lamp again, not when there are so many other options available.
customer_reviews.author: NYC_Live

customer_reviews.title: So good, I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE this lamp in my living room where we don't have overhead lighting. I even bought 2 because I loved it so much. It is awesome how it comes with a remote and they are super adjustable for diming. We lost the remote at one point and my daughter (3 years old) held her finger on the "button" sensor and showed us you can dim that way too! Great buy. And looks good too. And doesn't take up too much room. And gives off plenty of light. And you can point in so many directions.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp but had issues
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lamp but I did have some issues. 1. I bought 2 of them and 1 didn't work properly and had to be replaced. 2. Single remote does control both, but they have syncing issues. Sometimes only 1 turns on and sometimes it adjusts the brightness of both lamps at different levels. Other than that, I do like the style and the functionality of the lamps. Being able to adjust the tilt is a nice feature. I'd give it about a 3 1/2 stars due to the issues with the remote and the price.
customer_reviews.author: arias51

customer_reviews.title: Company does not stand behind product.
customer_reviews.text: The remote did not work when I received the lamp. I wrote to Tenergy. They wrote back after 2 days and asked me if I took the wrapping off the battery. Are you kidding me? I had told them I had in my original email! Then all they said was that they were out of remotes. They did not say when or if they would have more or they'd let me know when they were back in stock. So manly other choices! Choose another one
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Contacted seller about a very faint buzzing noise - have not heard any response back. Warranty might as well be non-existent. Very annoying since it's a pulsing noise. No good in the bedroom since I can't sleep with that noise constantly on.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Montefiore

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Smooth upward reflected light (though you can tip it to the side). Remote is simple which is perfect, On/Off and dimming. Overall quality seems good. Easy to set up. Using the single button on the lamp takes just a little practice but then seems fine. It is on/off/and dim all in the one button. Easy way around that, just use the remote. Definitely recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Remote control not working out of box
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these in the past two years. One of them we just opened and the light is not functioning properly: 1) remote control not always working 2) cannot be dimmed it’s already passed the return period. Need seller to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sun

customer_reviews.title: never realized I need one of these lamps until I received this
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are very happy with this floor lamp. It provides a nice light in a large room. I love how the remote can adjust the brightness and turn it on and off from across the room. No more getting up and fighting with a torch lamp to turn it on and off. LOL This a nice quality light. Very happy with this purchase, it is nicer than I anticipated and definitely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: 1st review

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and a bright light just that the remote doesn’t work. Hopefully it’s just the battery. But I did put an issue with customer service. I will update my review after the remote issue is resolved. The remote issues has been resolved and everything is working great! Bumped up the rating to 5 stars and great customer service from the seller and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: TAZ

customer_reviews.title: This thing is BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the brightest LED torchiere out there, and I think I found it. I really like the extra clear rim around the lamp, and this thing is easily 50% brighter than an old compact fluorescent one I had. The few second delay when you use the wall switch is bearable, and so far no issues after 1-2 months. Will update if anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Number One

customer_reviews.title: Bright, easy to assemble, would order again
customer_reviews.text: Gives off a warm bright light that fills the master bedroom. Much brighter than the ceiling fan light. In fact, I don't even use the ceiling fan light anymore. With the floor lamp, I can watch TV and read books without it being too dark and then use the remote control to turn off the light without getting out of bed. And the lamp isn't even next to the bed - it's across the room next to the TV. Highly recommend this as a supplement or standalone to brighten a room. I've been using this for 6 months and everything is still in great working order.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: The light has been working for over 2 years. It's super bright and customer support is great. Very bright but easy to dim.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp For Low Traffic Area
customer_reviews.text: Just love this lamp. Easy to assemble. Lights up the room. Dimmable down to nothing. Easy to use remote. Bought this one because it’s taller than those made by other companies. Could be knocked over, so put next to wall or in corner and don’t put in rooms visited by large animals or young children.
customer_reviews.author: WendyF

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's defective -the button on the pole for on off and dimming seems to work sometimes. I have to touch the button 5 or more times to turn it on, and even more times than that to get it to respond to dimming or brightening -I try to make sure my finger is entirely covering the button, or pressing it harder, or lighter. Once it works, then it goes up and down, but I shouldn't have to try 10 times to get it to work
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great light for the price. Definitely bright enough and the light tilts if you want to direct the light in a direction other than straight up. I have never had a lamp with a remote to control on/off and dimming...very nice feature. Some simple assembly required. I had no problem with that at all. Very happy with this lamp...
customer_reviews.author: Jef Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a 90 year old father
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 90 year old father for his apartment., Its great, very bright but you can turn it down on the lamp post or by remote control. Makes it easy for my father to adjust the light without having to get up. The 0light head is adjustable to rotate the light around. Handy feature.
customer_reviews.author: WNYer

customer_reviews.title: CAME WITHOUT REMOTE CONTROL AND WHITE SHADE VERY DIFFICULT TO SCREW IN
customer_reviews.text: The box came without a remote control included in it, and the white shade has 3 small screws which need to go in but the tool they sent to screw it in with did not work. Very bad customer service when I called to complain as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elie Fakhoury

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't have been happier ;-)
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my adult son, who is nearly impossible to buy for anymore. He had very specific ideas of what he wanted in a floor lamp, but not specific enough to point. Therefore, I was guessing and that made it even better when he opened it, lit up like he was 5 years old again, and hugged me like crazy. He put it together as soon as he got home and has been enjoying it ever since. The light itself is a great idea and the company was ideal, as the product was fully intact, the box was in perfect condition and it arrived ahead of schedule - and at Christmastime!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light started turning itself randomly on and off after a year
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, remote is very handy, everything works well for a year but after I rearranged my living room - while keeping my lamp plugged into the same connection, the lamp turns itself on and off at random moments - maybe about once a week. This is pretty annoying as I would return home sometimes with it being on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this product. The bottom was not even threaded. I tried to take it apart to send back, but the other threads are made of aluminum, so they would not come apart without taking a wrench to them--this would have scratched the surface and made them not returnable. Frankly, I am just going to throw the whole thing away and go buy something from Target. Very, very disappointed. Never had something so poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Neil A. Pinney

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp with dimmer capabilities
customer_reviews.text: There is only one issue I have with this lamp. Because I loved it so much, i bought a 2nd one. I have one on my main floor and one in an upstairs bedroom. If i turn on one using the remote, it turns on both lamps even though they are in different parts of the house. The remotes are not individual to the specific lamp. Not of fan of having lights turned on when the room is not in use.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Bright floor lamp and mediocre packaging
customer_reviews.text: It was a great floor lamp, love the design and it’s brightness. My only complaint is the packaging. I ordered the three of this product and all the boxes came damaged (lamp itself is fine). Unpacking is also annoying. There is tape everywhere and it’s impossible to unpack it without getting styrofoam flying everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: W-L. C.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lamp. Replaced a halogen. I'm picky when it comes to LEDs, and this produces no flicker that you get with many products. Only wish it was a slightly warmer color such as incandescents.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: After two years of ownership, it's basically just what I wanted as a replacement for my old halogen torchiere lamp. Set up went smoothly, the lamp & remote have worked as they should and nothing about its operation has irked me. The only thing I could maybe identify as a feature I'd like is a true night-light mode, where the lamp would barely be illuminated. The lowest setting is brighter than you'd want for sleeping purposes - minor quibble. Otherwise, I like the brightness range and degree of control that the small adjustment steps allow for.
customer_reviews.author: David Windmuller

customer_reviews.title: Light turns on randomly.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this light since February 2019. This light will turn on randomly at all hours of the day. I called Tenergy support and they said to move the light to a different part of the room because of radio waves affecting the light. Lame excuse. Don't buy this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Dudek

customer_reviews.title: Great bright and dim
customer_reviews.text: Liked these so much that I replaced all my lamps and bought 2 for my son. Easy to put together and I like the tilting feature. Nice to use the remote to brighten or dim when you need.
customer_reviews.author: Tjones

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Easy to Assemble .. Remote works Great !
customer_reviews.text: Actually have 2 of these in the same room (opposite corners). Wasn't planning on it but one (1) remote turns them both on and off. The light plate is adjustable and the entire assembly is fairly subtle while still providing bright (adjustable) light.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Guy

customer_reviews.title: I CAN SEE
customer_reviews.text: My office at home had no overhead lighting. I had a desk lamp. Could not see very well in the evening. With this light, it is a miracle. I CAN SEE. It is great, lights up the entire room.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Brightens up the whole room.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these lamps. One for me and one for my 90 year old mother. The light is bright and easy to direct for the perfect direction also the remote is easy to use, even fir my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Irene J. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great energy saver & high quality product
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Would have given a 5-star rating but the screws at the top of the lamp were a bit hard to get into the alignment spots, but did go in after some struggle. Well please with the light that can be given out with this low watts lamp! Nice remote. Very good quality and strong aluminum lamp product. The lamp puts together with great ease other than some pushing to align up the screws for the top of the lamp. Will probably buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: F Strege

customer_reviews.title: One remote controls all lamps if you buy more than 1
customer_reviews.text: Cant buy two of them because one remote controls both off them even in different rooms
customer_reviews.author: donald james

customer_reviews.title: One of the best you will find!
customer_reviews.text: Does its job - Remote control is the best thing ever. I basically can vary the amount of brightness depending on my mood so its simply amazing for the price! I think it is able to light up a 11x12 room easily without additional lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's room, and its perfect. Lots of light. Energy efficient. About the right height for her room. We have had it for a while now, and it has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Musicfan

customer_reviews.title: We now own 3
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great lamp. Looks modern (for a floor lamp), and provides great light. The only thing that takes away from 5 stars is that the lamps are a bit “possessed “. Lights turn themselves on occasionally. At first thought maybe the cats were stepping on the remote but, additional lights are in closed rooms with doors closed. Sometimes wake in the morning or home from work and there is a light on.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: Since I work from home and the hours vary from very early in the morning to late at night so I put it at my workstation to conveniently remote control the brightness/on/off. It works perfectly as intended and also makes my work area looks less ugly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying it! We bought our first one a couple month ago! And we end up think we need one in every room since it is bright!
customer_reviews.author: Shiao T.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny remote.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp.The remote is TINY, EASY to misplace. Have to find a place where it doesn't get lost. But still, considering a second lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice H

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: We had it for almost 2 years then we lost the remote. I wish that they had an easy way to order another. Otherwise it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Decent light
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was brighter than it is. It's pretty much useless if you don't have the remote. With the remote it dims like it's supposed to and seems to work pretty well otherwise. I just wish it was brighter than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and easy
customer_reviews.text: I love the lamps! I have them in two separate rooms but a remote will operate both when I only want to turn one on/off
customer_reviews.author: GypsyJane

customer_reviews.title: Bright, stylish lamp that is great for a large room
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice looking lamp. My husband had a little trouble assembling it and I think he felt the instructions should tell you to put the glass on before putting the base together. But it still took him only about 15 or 20 minutes and it's a very bright lamp that lights a large room with a high vaulted ceiling that has no overhead lighting, which is exactly what we were looking for. Our old one was halogen and bright but very hot and I was afraid to leave it on when I wasn't around. This one also doesn't have any area where dust or bugs can get in. We are very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie W.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year.
customer_reviews.text: The brightness was great. Just what I was looking for. However it didn't even last a year. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Real Nice Adjustable LED Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design, remote control, adjustable brightness, adjustable angle, really brightens up a room. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lrobby99

customer_reviews.title: Would give 5 stars except remote is easy to lose.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! Great range of light but sometimes hard to make brighter or dimmer since I lost the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Husovsky Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I like it but I wish you could turn it lower
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I wish it could go lower than 5% like the old incandescent lamps
customer_reviews.author: victor garcia

customer_reviews.title: Remote is great very bright light and tall enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these lamps and the small remote works for both of them so you can turn on both lamps and dim both lamps simultaneously. The light is also very bright and the lamp is tall enough that it doesn’t get into your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for soft lighting for watching TV. We set them both to the level we wanted and are able to turn them off and on using one remote. They retain the setting very well. No muss - no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: C A Stone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light fixture......
customer_reviews.text: High quality, infinite dimming capability, great remote and great value
customer_reviews.author: Gerronimo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple days
customer_reviews.text: The lamp stopped working after a couples days. I contacted the company and they said they can't help me since I purchased through Amazon and told me to contact customer support. I guess I will be returning the product as they rather process a return than to support their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you feel like a light, sometimes you don't
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice light, although it has it's own mind sometimes. Haven't used the remote yet, but is good for being able to read. Sometimes when I turn it on, it stays dim, sometimes not.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought it...it's everything I wanted. Remote on/off and dimmer
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: The remote and button are very easy for him to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome light! We bought it for my father-in- law. He Loves how bright this is. Lights up the whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this light. I wish it was brighter. Love the remote.
customer_reviews.author: thumper

customer_reviews.title: Provides good indirect lighting.
customer_reviews.text: It fills our living room with light and the ability to dim the lamp is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good light.
customer_reviews.text: Good light . I was expecting it to brighter from reading the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Will be ordering another for my kids room
customer_reviews.author: KacieLynn

customer_reviews.title: Greatest light you'll ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: It's adjustable lighting. It has a remote. You can tilt the light up and down. It lasts 27+ years!? This is an amazing light.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Superb Product & Company
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. This makes the 3rd I’ve ordered. AND, their customer service is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Hollang

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: One of the absolute best lamps I’ve ever owned. This little thing gives so MUCH light. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abayady1

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. Immediately purchased a second one. Especially love the remote control with dimmer options.
customer_reviews.author: E. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp... Lousy Remote Capability
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is fantastic! Wife has eyesight problems and the dimmable light is great. Wish it was stated up in description that all lamps and remotes use the same frequency. We bought two and you can't control them separately. If Tenergy would fix that, we'd happily buy more.
customer_reviews.author: William Lee Harris

customer_reviews.title: Needed remote because I’m disabled
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamp. Remote control doesn’t work any more. Replaced with new batteries. Disconnected reconnected no response from remote. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia A Fraioli

customer_reviews.title: Interferes with AM Radio signal
customer_reviews.text: I keep this lamp in my office, where I sometimes listen to AM radio. When the lamp is turned on it interferes with the radio signal and causes lots of static. No interference when it's turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Waddy

customer_reviews.title: Good Light
customer_reviews.text: Performs as advertised. The lamp is inconspicuous, easy to assemble, and provides an adjustable level of light.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Morris

customer_reviews.title: It will flood the room.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. If you wanna flood the room like a ceiling fixture? It does it.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Tenergy "lighting the way".
customer_reviews.text: The ability to roate the head is just one the products desirable features.
customer_reviews.author: gll

customer_reviews.title: So great - I ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.text: This is the brightest lamp I have ever had the pleasure of owning. It brightens up the room completely! The dimmable option is a nice touch & the ability to angle the light is very useful. It was so great that I purchased a second one! Very easy to assemble. If you have a dark room that needs a super bright light then this will do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased two of these lamps. One for our living room and one for a bedroom. One remote control unfortunately turns both lamps on sometimes!😬Otherwise great brightness for dark spacious rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Missing top cover
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know when I first received the item, but realized that there should've been a top cover for this light. Was going to buy another one, and found out that there's missing top cover.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Byun

customer_reviews.title: Short life of LED's
customer_reviews.text: After about 2 years of use noticed 6 of the LED's are completely not working and burned out. Disappointed in the short life. The remote does not work past 4 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Fun

customer_reviews.title: good deal and good product
customer_reviews.text: very easy to asemble with my kids. The light is bright in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Christine T.

customer_reviews.title: Bright & Easy Use
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! So glad it comes with a remote because tapping it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Rise&Shine19

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and remote worked on first try. Love the dimmer feature
customer_reviews.author: Anne S

customer_reviews.title: very bright
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and will fill the room with light.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for my office
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my office. It has a good range of brightness. The remote is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Graham

customer_reviews.title: The remote did not work. Fortunately I do not need the remote so it was a non issue.
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely purchase this product again. It looks great and gives great light. It fits easily into any corner and does not take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Being able to use a remote is great.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Uses a remote. Low watt usage for such a bright lamp. This is a great lamp.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: Turns on by itself
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamp it's awesome. It's just weird, not sure if anyone is experiencing it but the light turns on by itself a couple times a week randomly ..
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with any instructions or screws to attach the lamp cover. Completely unusable — disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lamp. The remote works from other rooms. It lights up my room so well. I LOVE this lamp. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Wrubel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Best quality and easy to put it together. Bought one two years ago and bought one last year. Simple and chic
customer_reviews.author: Tina rich

customer_reviews.title: Slim design - good light - as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. The remote control works well. Plenty of light
customer_reviews.author: William S. Slattery

customer_reviews.title: Missing threw screws for top plate
customer_reviews.text: I love the lamp and will amend the review once the seller sends the screws
customer_reviews.author: chimchim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, was easy to put together. Lights up my bonus room beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin

product_meta.title: Tenergy Torchiere Remote Control Floor Lamp, LED Floor lamp 30W (150W Equivalent) Standing Lamp with Stepless Touch Dimmer, Two-Part Trip-Proof Cable, 90° Adjustable Top, Warm White Light
feature_bullets: ENERGY SAVING POWERFUL LIGHTING - The beautifully crafted Tenergy Led floor lamp with remote is accentuated by its modern matte metal finish. Using LED’s that produce a warm white light, it’s brightness is unparalleled in producing 3,000 lumens strong lighting (the same as a 150W incandescent light bulb) but at an energy saving rate of only 30W of power. Using an astounding 85% less energy this is the best modern floor lamp for living room, bedroom, or office.

CONVENIENT REMOTE & TILTABLE DESIGN - The upright floor lamp comes with a 360° omnidirectional (point anywhere) remote control to set your lighting anywhere from up to 60 feet. The remote can be easily placed on metal surfaces (fridge, whiteboard, and lamp) for convenient access. The head light is tiltable to a 90°degree angle to illuminate specific areas that you choose. Don’t settle for the floor lamps that are rigid in design, get the one suited for your needs in both the home and office.

TOUCH SENSITIVE DIMMER MEMORY - A single tap on the touch sensitive LED Torchiere will turn the lamp on/another single tap for off. With a stepless dimming design, holding down on the touch sensor will adjust the lighting gradually to suit your needs. Once you’ve set a comfortable brightness level, the built in memory function will keep that for you even when turned off.

SAFETY A PRIORITY - The UL-certified adapter on the dimmable floor Lamp converts the voltage output from 120V to a mere 24V to avoid electroshock. The trip-proof power cord has a two piece detachable design to prevent accidents and with a heavy lamp base will stay grounded.

2 YEARS EXTENDED WARRANTY - The Tenergy Torchiere Lamp was built to lasts up-to 30,000 hours. Register your Tenergy Torchiere LED Floor Lamp to receive 2 years extended warranty and lifetime support from our friendly customer service. *NOTE: The remote controller's RF tech can control other identical Tenergy LED floor lamps within range even in different rooms.
